short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly switch tabs using the omnibar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OmniTab lets you search your tabs with the omnibox. To start, you type in the keyword "o" in the address bar, and tap space to activate OmniTab search. Then, type in the name of the tab that you want to find and press enter.
